title: Email validation API
description: Check if an email address is valid and really exists, it is not a disposable email address and it is not a temporary email address.

title: Domain validation API
description: Check if a domain is valid and really exists, it is not a parked domain and it is not a temporary domain.

title: Phone validation API
description: Check if a phone number is valid and really exists, it is not a disposable phone number and it is not a temporary phone number.

title: Countries API
description: Get information about countries, such as name, code, currency, timezone, phone code, etc.

title: Currencies API
description: Get information about currencies, such as name, code, symbol, etc.

title: IP addresses API
description: Get information about IP addresses, such as country, city, timezone, etc.

title: WHOIS lookup API
description: Get information about domains, such as owner, registrar, creation date, expiration date, etc.

title: VAT checker API
description: Check if a VAT number is valid and really exists, it is not a fake VAT number and it is not a temporary VAT number.

title: Timezones API
description: Get information about timezones, such as name, code, offset, etc.
